author: veithen
msg: Configured the maven-deploy-plugin with skip=true so that the distributions are no longer deployed to the Maven repository. Note: this needs to be tested during the next release.

author: veithen
msg: Removed an invocation of the antrun plugin that cleans up things from the target directory in the install phase. This is the job of the clean plugin/goal/phase.

author: hwright
msg: Remove the 1.6.x-r980811 branch, which was reintegrated in r987710.
